label: Nov 20, 1963 路 Dallas, TX
title: The Ralph Leon Yates incident
body: Ralph Leon Yates, a refrigeration mechanic, picks up a hitchhiker carrying a long paper-wrapped package. The man asks about the President's motorcade route and says he could shoot anyone from a building with a scope rifle.

label: Late Sept 1963 路 Dallas, TX
title: The Sylvia Odio Incident
body: Sylvia Odio reported that three men, including one identified as 'Leon Oswald', visited her home in Dallas to seek support for the anti-Castro cause. The visit allegedly occurred while Oswald was purportedly elsewhere.

label: April 10, 1963 路 Dallas, TX
title: The Walker Incident
body: An assassination attempt is made on General Edwin Walker at his home. A bullet is fired through his window, narrowly missing him. The Warren Commission later concluded Lee Harvey Oswald was the shooter based on Marina Oswald's testimony and a note allegedly left by Oswald.

label: Oct 16, 1963 路 Dallas, TX
title: Oswald Hired at TSBD
body: Lee Harvey Oswald begins work at the Texas School Book Depository (TSBD) as an order filler earning $1.25 per hour. The job referral came from Ruth Paine's neighbor, Linnie Mae Randle, whose brother Buell Wesley Frazier also worked there.
